name: Yuri Gagarin
opinionOfVictim: was a lazy bastard who cheated at cards. But I would never hurt a fly.
otherTestimony: I heard <name> arguing with Dr. Hartman in the <sceneOfCrime> module two days ago. I don't know what it was about.

name: Sergei Korolev
opinionOfVictim: was anoying. So I just avoided him. I don't waste my time with people who are a waste of time.
otherTestimony: I heard that Yuri owes Dr. Hartman some money. I guess that's one debt Yuri won't have to pay.

name: Jean-Pierre Haigner√©
opinionOfVictim: was a great guy. Dr. Hartman always shared his ice cream with me. It might have been because he hated it. But it was a kindness that I'll remember him for.
otherTestimony: Dr. Hartman seemed really anxious and secretive the day before. I don't know what was going on. But every time I saw him on a computer, he locked the screen.

name: Koichi Wakata
activityAtTimeOfMurder: reviewing results from the last experiment that I did.
opinionOfVictim: seemed very private. He wasn't very open about what he was working on and seemed nervous... like he didn't want anyone to know what he was doing.
otherTestimony: Dr. Hartman seemed to value his privacy. So I didn't intrude.

name: Samuel Goldstein
opinionOfVictim: really stunk. Nobody smells good up here... But, he's smelling any better now.
otherTestimony: I'm a little suspicious of Yuri. I think that he was very resentful toward him.
